                    <main>
                        <h1 id="ordinal-bounty-hunting-hints"><a class="header" href="#ordinal-bounty-hunting-hints">Ordinal Bounty Hunting Hints</a></h1>
<ul>
<li>
<p>The <code>ord</code> wallet can send and receive specific satoshis. Additionally,
ordinal theory is extremely simple. A clever hacker should be able to write
code from scratch to manipulate satoshis using ordinal theory in no time.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>For more information about ordinal theory, check out the <a href="./faq.html">FAQ</a> for
an overview, the
<a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord/blob/master/bip.mediawiki">BIP</a> for the
technical details, and the <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord">ord repo</a> for the
<code>ord</code> wallet and block explorer.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Satoshi was the original developer of ordinal theory. However, he knew that
others would consider it heretical and dangerous, so he hid his knowledge,
and it was lost to the sands of time. This potent theory is only now being
rediscovered. You can help by researching rare satoshis.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>Good luck and godspeed!</p>

                    </main>

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="ordinal-bounty-0"><a class="header" href="#ordinal-bounty-0">Ordinal Bounty 0</a></h1>
<h2 id="criteria"><a class="header" href="#criteria">Criteria</a></h2>
<p>Send a sat whose ordinal number ends with a zero to the submission address:</p>
<p>✅: <a href="https://ordinals.com/ordinal/1857578125803250">1857578125803250</a></p>
<p>❌: <a href="https://ordinals.com/ordinal/1857578125803251">1857578125803251</a></p>
<p>The sat must be the first sat of the output you send.</p>
<h2 id="reward"><a class="header" href="#reward">Reward</a></h2>
<p>100,000 sats</p>
<h2 id="submission-address"><a class="header" href="#submission-address">Submission Address</a></h2>

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <h1 id="ordinal-bounty-1"><a class="header" href="#ordinal-bounty-1">Ordinal Bounty 1</a></h1>
<h2 id="criteria"><a class="header" href="#criteria">Criteria</a></h2>
<p>The transaction that submits a UTXO containing the oldest sat, i.e., that with
the lowest number, amongst all submitted UTXOs will be judged the winner.</p>
<p>The bounty is open for submissions until block 753984—the first block of
difficulty adjustment period 374. Submissions included in block 753984 or later
will not be considered.</p>
<h2 id="reward"><a class="header" href="#reward">Reward</a></h2>
<p>200,000 sats</p>
<h2 id="submission-address"><a class="header" href="#submission-address">Submission Address</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/145Z7PFHyVrwiMWwEcUmDgFbmUbQSU9aap"><code>145Z7PFHyVrwiMWwEcUmDgFbmUbQSU9aap</code></a></p>
<h2 id="status"><a class="header" href="#status">Status</a></h2>
<p>Claimed by <a href="https://twitter.com/rodarmor/status/1569883266508853251">@ordinalsindex</a>!</p>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("en");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");
                          }

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "bounty/2.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                        <h1 id="ordinal-bounty-2"><a class="header" href="#ordinal-bounty-2">Ordinal Bounty 2</a></h1>
<h2 id="criteria"><a class="header" href="#criteria">Criteria</a></h2>
<p>Send an <span class=uncommon>uncommon</span> sat to the submission address:</p>
<p>✅: <a href="https://ordinals.com/sat/347100000000000">347100000000000</a></p>
<p>❌: <a href="https://ordinals.com/sat/6685000001337">6685000001337</a></p>
<p>Confirm that the submission address has not received transactions before submitting your entry. Only the first successful submission will be rewarded.</p>
<h2 id="reward"><a class="header" href="#reward">Reward</a></h2>
<p>300,000 sats</p>
<h2 id="submission-address"><a class="header" href="#submission-address">Submission Address</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/1Hyr94uypwWq5CQffaXHvwUMEyBPp3TUZH"><code>1Hyr94uypwWq5CQffaXHvwUMEyBPp3TUZH</code></a></p>

<html lang="en" class="coal" dir="ltr">

        <!-- Book generated using mdBook -->
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <title>Bounty 3: 400,000 sats - Ordinal Theory Handbook</title>


        <!-- Custom HTML head -->

        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");
                          }

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "bounty/3.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                        <a href="../print.html" title="Print this book" aria-label="Print this book">
                            <i id="print-button" class="fa fa-print"></i>
                        </a>
                        <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord" title="Git repository" aria-label="Git repository">
                            <i id="git-repository-button" class="fa fa-github"></i>
                        </a>

                    </div>
                </div>

                    </form>

                        <div id="searchresults-header" class="searchresults-header"></div>
                        <ul id="searchresults">
                        </ul>
                    </div>

                <script>
                    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                    });
                </script>

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="ordinal-bounty-3"><a class="header" href="#ordinal-bounty-3">Ordinal Bounty 3</a></h1>
<h2 id="criteria"><a class="header" href="#criteria">Criteria</a></h2>
<p>Ordinal bounty 3 has two parts, both of which are based on <em>ordinal names</em>.
Ordinal names are a modified base-26 encoding of ordinal numbers. To avoid
locking short names inside the unspendable genesis block coinbase reward,
ordinal names get <em>shorter</em> as the ordinal number gets <em>longer</em>. The name of
sat 0, the first sat to be mined is <code>nvtdijuwxlp</code> and the name of sat
2,099,999,997,689,999, the last sat to be mined, is <code>a</code>.</p>
<p>The bounty is open for submissions until block 840000—the first block after the
fourth halvening. Submissions included in block 840000 or later will not be
considered.</p>
<p>Both parts use <a href="frequency.tsv">frequency.tsv</a>, a list of words and the number
of times they occur in the <a href="http://storage.googleapis.com/books/ngrams/books/datasetsv2.html">Google Books Ngram
dataset</a>.
filtered to only include the names of sats which will have been mined by the
end of the submission period, that appear at least 5000 times in the corpus.</p>
<p><code>frequency.tsv</code> is a file of tab-separated values. The first column is the
word, and the second is the number of times it appears in the corpus. The
entries are sorted from least-frequently occurring to most-frequently
occurring.</p>
<p><code>frequency.tsv</code> was compiled using <a href="https://github.com/casey/onegrams">this
program</a>.</p>
<p>To search an <code>ord</code> wallet for sats with a name in <code>frequency.tsv</code>, use the
following <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord"><code>ord</code></a> command:</p>
<pre><code>ord wallet sats --tsv frequency.tsv
</code></pre>
<p>This command requires the sat index, so <code>--index-sats</code> must be passed to ord
when first creating the index.</p>
<h3 id="part-0"><a class="header" href="#part-0">Part 0</a></h3>
<p><em>Rare sats pair best with rare words.</em></p>
<p>The transaction that submits the UTXO containing the sat whose name appears
with the lowest number of occurrences in <code>frequency.tsv</code> shall be the winner of
part 0.</p>
<h3 id="part-1"><a class="header" href="#part-1">Part 1</a></h3>
<p><em>Popularity is the font of value.</em></p>
<p>The transaction that submits the UTXO containing the sat whose name appears
with the highest number of occurrences in <code>frequency.tsv</code> shall be the winner
of part 1.</p>
<h3 id="tie-breaking"><a class="header" href="#tie-breaking">Tie Breaking</a></h3>
<p>In the case of a tie, where two submissions occur with the same frequency, the
earlier submission shall be the winner.</p>
<h2 id="reward"><a class="header" href="#reward">Reward</a></h2>
<ul>
<li>Part 0: 200,000 sats</li>
<li>Part 1: 200,000 sats</li>
<li>Total: 400,000 sats</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="submission-address"><a class="header" href="#submission-address">Submission Address</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/17m5rvMpi78zG8RUpCRd6NWWMJtWmu65kg"><code>17m5rvMpi78zG8RUpCRd6NWWMJtWmu65kg</code></a></p>
<h2 id="status"><a class="header" href="#status">Status</a></h2>
<p>Unclaimed!</p>

                    </main>

                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>


                        <div style="clear: both"></div>

                        <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                    </a>

            </nav>

        </div>

            window.playground_copyable = true;

        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {

        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                    <main>
                        <h1 id="contributing-to-ord"><a class="header" href="#contributing-to-ord">Contributing to <code>ord</code></a></h1>
<h2 id="suggested-steps"><a class="header" href="#suggested-steps">Suggested Steps</a></h2>
<ol>
<li>Find an issue you want to work on.</li>
<li>Figure out what would be a good first step towards resolving the issue. This
could be in the form of code, research, a proposal, or suggesting that it be
closed, if it's out of date or not a good idea in the first place.</li>
<li>Comment on the issue with an outline of your suggested first step, and
asking for feedback. Of course, you can dive in and start writing code or
tests immediately, but this avoids potentially wasted effort, if the issue
is out of date, not clearly specified, blocked on something else, or
otherwise not ready to implement.</li>
<li>If the issue requires a code change or bugfix, open a draft PR with tests,
and ask for feedback. This makes sure that everyone is on the same page
about what needs to be done, or what the first step in solving the issue
should be. Also, since tests are required, writing the tests first makes it
easy to confirm that the change can be tested easily.</li>
<li>Mash the keyboard randomly until the tests pass, and refactor until the code
is ready to submit.</li>
<li>Mark the PR as ready to review.</li>
<li>Revise the PR as needed.</li>
<li>And finally, mergies!</li>
</ol>
<h2 id="start-small"><a class="header" href="#start-small">Start small</a></h2>
<p>Small changes will allow you to make an impact
quickly, and if you take the wrong tack, you won't have wasted much time.</p>
<p>Ideas for small issues:</p>
<ul>
<li>Add a new test or test case that increases test coverage</li>
<li>Add or improve documentation</li>
<li>Find an issue that needs more research, and do that research and summarize it
in a comment</li>
<li>Find an out-of-date issue and comment that it can be closed</li>
<li>Find an issue that shouldn't be done, and provide constructive feedback
detailing why you think that is the case</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="merge-early-and-often"><a class="header" href="#merge-early-and-often">Merge early and often</a></h2>
<p>Break up large tasks into multiple smaller steps that individually make
progress. If there's a bug, you can open a PR that adds a failing ignored test.
This can be merged, and the next step can be to fix the bug and unignore the
test. Do research or testing, and report on your results. Break a feature into
small sub-features, and implement them one at a time.</p>
<p>Figuring out how to break down a larger PR into smaller PRs where each can be
merged is an art form well-worth practicing. The hard part is that each PR must
itself be an improvement.</p>
<p>I strive to follow this advice myself, and am always better off when I do.</p>
<p>Small changes are fast to write, review, and merge, which is much more fun than
laboring over a single giant PR that takes forever to write, review, and merge.
Small changes don't take much time, so if you need to stop working on a small
change, you won't have wasted much time as compared to a larger change that
represents many hours of work. Getting a PR in quickly improves the project a
little bit immediately, instead of having to wait a long time for larger
improvement. Small changes are less likely to accumulate merge conflict. As the
Athenians said: <em>The fast commit what they will, the slow merge what they
must.</em></p>
<h2 id="get-help"><a class="header" href="#get-help">Get help</a></h2>
<p>If you're stuck for more than 15 minutes, ask for help, like a Rust Discord,
Stack Exchange, or in a project issue or discussion.</p>
<h2 id="practice-hypothesis-driven-debugging"><a class="header" href="#practice-hypothesis-driven-debugging">Practice hypothesis-driven debugging</a></h2>
<p>Formulate a hypothesis as to what is causing the problem. Figure out how to
test that hypothesis. Perform that tests. If it works, great, you fixed the
issue or now you know how to fix the issue. If not, repeat with a new
hypothesis.</p>
<h2 id="pay-attention-to-error-messages"><a class="header" href="#pay-attention-to-error-messages">Pay attention to error messages</a></h2>
<p>Read all error messages and don't tolerate warnings.</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">
                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="faq.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>
                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="donate.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">
                                <i class="fa fa-angle-right"></i>
                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>
            </div>

            <nav class="nav-wide-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">

    <div id="body-container">
        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <script>
                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("de");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "404.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }

                    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }

            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');

            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');

                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {

            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');

                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });

                        </label>

                    <main>
                        <h1 id="hinweise-zur-ordinal-bounty-jagen"><a class="header" href="#hinweise-zur-ordinal-bounty-jagen">Hinweise zur Ordinal Bounty jagen</a></h1>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Die <code>ord</code>-Wallet kann bestimmte Satoshis senden und empfangen. Außerdem ist die Ordinaltheorie äußerst einfach. Ein geschickter Hacker sollte in kürzester Zeit Code von Grund auf schreiben können, um Satoshis mithilfe der Ordinaltheorie zu manipulieren.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Für weitere Informationen zur ordinaltheorie sieh dir das <a href="./faq.html">FAQ</a> für einen Überblick, das <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord/blob/master/bip.mediawiki">BIP</a> für die technischen Details und das <a href="https://github.com/ordinals/ord">ord-Repository</a> für die <code>ord</code> Wallet und den Block-Explorer an.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Satoshi war der ursprüngliche Entwickler der Ordinaltheorie. Allerdings wusste er, dass andere es als ketzerisch und gefährlich betrachten würden, deshalb verbarg er sein Wissen, und es ging in den Wirren der Zeit verloren. Diese mächtige Theorie wird erst jetzt wiederentdeckt. Du kannst helfen, indem du seltene Satoshis erforschst..</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>Viel Glück und gute Fahrt!</p>

                    </main>

                    <nav class="nav-wrapper" aria-label="Page navigation">

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>
                    </nav>
                </div>

            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                        <h1 id="ordinal-bounty-0"><a class="header" href="#ordinal-bounty-0">Ordinal Bounty 0</a></h1>
<h2 id="kriterien"><a class="header" href="#kriterien">Kriterien</a></h2>
<p>Senden Sie einen Sat, dessen Ordnungszahl mit einer Null endet, an die Übermittlungsadresse:</p>
<p>✅: <a href="https://ordinals.com/ordinal/1857578125803250">1857578125803250</a></p>
<p>❌: <a href="https://ordinals.com/ordinal/1857578125803251">1857578125803251</a></p>
<p>Der Sat muss der erste Sat der von Ihnen gesendeten Ausgabe (output) sein.</p>
<h2 id="belohnen"><a class="header" href="#belohnen">Belohnen</a></h2>
<p>100,000 sats</p>
<h2 id="einsendeadresse"><a class="header" href="#einsendeadresse">Einsendeadresse</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/1PE7u4wbDP2RqfKN6geD1bG57v9Gj9FXm3"><code>1PE7u4wbDP2RqfKN6geD1bG57v9Gj9FXm3</code></a></p>
<h2 id="status"><a class="header" href="#status">Status</a></h2>
<p>Beansprucht von <a href="https://twitter.com/rodarmor/status/1560793241473400833">@count_null</a>!</p>

                    </main>

                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->

                                <i class="fa fa-angle-left"></i>

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");

                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "bounty/1.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;

                          }

                <div id="content" class="content">
                    <main>
                        <h1 id="ordinal-belohnung-1"><a class="header" href="#ordinal-belohnung-1">Ordinal Belohnung 1</a></h1>
<h2 id="kriterien"><a class="header" href="#kriterien">Kriterien</a></h2>
<p>Die Transaktion, die eine UTXO enthält, die den ältesten sat repräsentiert, das heißt denjenigen mit der niedrigsten Zahl, unter allen eingereichten UTXOs, wird als gewinner betrachtet.</p>
<p>Die belohnung ist für Einreichungen bis zum Block 753984— geöffnet dem ersten Block des Schwierigkeitsanpassungszeitraums 374. Einreichungen, die in Block 753984 oder später enthalten sind, werden nicht berücksichtigt.</p>
<h2 id="belohnen"><a class="header" href="#belohnen">Belohnen</a></h2>
<p>200,000 sats</p>
<h2 id="einsendeadresse"><a class="header" href="#einsendeadresse">Einsendeadresse</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/145Z7PFHyVrwiMWwEcUmDgFbmUbQSU9aap"><code>145Z7PFHyVrwiMWwEcUmDgFbmUbQSU9aap</code></a></p>
<h2 id="status"><a class="header" href="#status">Status</a></h2>
<p>Eingefordert von <a href="https://twitter.com/rodarmor/status/1569883266508853251">@ordinalsindex</a>!</p>

                    </main>

                        <!-- Mobile navigation buttons -->
                            <a rel="prev" href="../bounty/0.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters previous" title="Previous chapter" aria-label="Previous chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Left">

                            </a>

                            <a rel="next prefetch" href="../bounty/2.html" class="mobile-nav-chapters next" title="Next chapter" aria-label="Next chapter" aria-keyshortcuts="Right">

                            </a>

                        <div style="clear: both"></div>

        <!-- Track and set sidebar scroll position -->
        <script>
            var sidebarScrollbox = document.querySelector('#sidebar .sidebar-scrollbox');
            sidebarScrollbox.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                    sessionStorage.setItem('sidebar-scroll', sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop);
                }
            }, { passive: true });
            var sidebarScrollTop = sessionStorage.getItem('sidebar-scroll');
            sessionStorage.removeItem('sidebar-scroll');
            if (sidebarScrollTop) {
                // preserve sidebar scroll position when navigating via links within sidebar
                sidebarScrollbox.scrollTop = sidebarScrollTop;
            } else {
                // scroll sidebar to current active section when navigating via "next/previous chapter" buttons
                var activeSection = document.querySelector('#sidebar .active');
                if (activeSection) {
                    activeSection.scrollIntoView({ block: 'center' });
                }
            }
        </script>

                          let langToggle = document.getElementById("language-toggle");
                          let langList = document.getElementById("language-list");
                          langToggle.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
                              langList.style.display = langList.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block";
                          });
                          let selectedLang = document.getElementById("de");
                          if (selectedLang) {
                              selectedLang.parentNode.classList.add("theme-selected");

                          // The path to the root, taking the current
                          // language into account.
                          let full_path_to_root = "../../";
                          // The page path (mdbook only gives us
                          // access to the path to the Markdown file).
                          let path = "bounty/2.md".replace(/\.md$/, ".html");
                          for (let lang of langList.querySelectorAll("a")) {
                              if (lang.id == "en") {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${path}&nbsp;;
                              } else {
                                  lang.href = &nbsp;${full_path_to_root}${lang.id}/${path}&nbsp;;
                              }
                          }
                        </script>

                        <h1 id="ordinal-belohnung-2"><a class="header" href="#ordinal-belohnung-2">Ordinal Belohnung 2</a></h1>
<h2 id="kriterien"><a class="header" href="#kriterien">Kriterien</a></h2>
<p>Senden an <span class=uncommon>ungewöhnlich</span>sats an die Einreichungsadresse:✅: <a href="https://ordinals.com/sat/347100000000000">347100000000000</a></p>
<p>❌: <a href="https://ordinals.com/sat/6685000001337">6685000001337</a></p>
<p>Bestätigen Sie, dass die Einreichungsadresse keine Transaktionen erhalten hat, bevor Sie Ihren Beitrag einreichen. Nur die erste erfolgreiche Einreichung wird belohnt.</p>
<h2 id="belohnen"><a class="header" href="#belohnen">Belohnen</a></h2>
<p>300,000 sats</p>
<h2 id="einsendeadresse"><a class="header" href="#einsendeadresse">Einsendeadresse</a></h2>
<p><a href="https://mempool.space/address/1Hyr94uypwWq5CQffaXHvwUMEyBPp3TUZH"><code>1Hyr94uypwWq5CQffaXHvwUMEyBPp3TUZH</code></a></p>
<h2 id="status"><a class="header" href="#status">Status</a></h2>
<p>Eingefordert von <a href="https://twitter.com/rodarmor/status/1582424455615172608">@utxoset</a>!</p>

                    </main>

        <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
        <script>
            var path_to_root = "../";
            var default_theme = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches ? "coal" : "coal";
        </script>

        <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
        <script>
            try {
                var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
                var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

                if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
                }

                if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
                }
            } catch (e) { }
        </script>

        <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
        <script>
            var theme;
            try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
            if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
            var html = document.querySelector('html');
            html.classList.remove('coal')
            html.classList.add(theme);
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            body.classList.remove('no-js')
            body.classList.add('js');
        </script>

        <input type="checkbox" id="sidebar-toggle-anchor" class="hidden">

        <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
        <script>
            var body = document.querySelector('body');
            var sidebar = null;
            var sidebar_toggle = document.getElementById("sidebar-toggle-anchor");
            if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
                try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
                sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
            } else {
                sidebar = 'hidden';
            }
            sidebar_toggle.checked = sidebar === 'visible';
            body.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
            body.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
        </script>
